data.title: Mediterranean Aviation Agreement between the European Union and its Member States, of the one part, and the government of the State of Israel, of the other part, to take account of the accession to th
data.text:
Proposal for a COUNCIL DECISION on the signing, on behalf of the European Union and its Member States, and provisional application of a Protocol amending the Euro-Mediterranean Aviation Agreement between the European Union and its Member States, of the one part, and the government of the State of Israel, of the other part, to take account of the accession to the European Union of the Republic of Croatia - Adoption - Main contents

Kerngegevens

Document date 08-09-2014 Publication date 10-09-2014 Reference 12716/14 From General Secretariat of the Council External link original article Original document in PDF

Text

Council of the European Union Brussels, 8 September 2014 (OR. en)

12716/14

Interinstitutional File: 2014/0188 (NLE)

AVIATION 166 ISR 7

"I/A" ITEM NOTE

From: General Secretariat of the Council

To: Permanent Representatives Committee/Council

No. Cion doc.: 11190/14 AVIATION 137 ISR 2

Subject: Proposal for a COUNCIL DECISION on the signing, on behalf of the

European Union and its Member States, and provisional application of a Protocol amending the Euro-Mediterranean Aviation Agreement between the European Union and its Member States, of the one part, and the government of the State of Israel, of the other part, to take account of the accession to the European Union of the Republic of Croatia - Adoption

1.

The Euro-mediterranean Aviation Agreement with Israel is the result of the mandate granted to the Commission by the Council and the Representatives of the Governments of the

Member States, meeting within the Council in order to open negotiations with Israel on a comprehensive air transport agreement. The mandate was agreed on 8 April 2008.

2.

Further to the successful conclusion of the negotiations, the Decision of the Council and of the representatives of the Member States meeting within the Council concerning the signature and provisional application of the Euro-mediterranean Aviation Agreement between the

European Union and its Member States and the Government of the State of Israel was adopted by the Council on 20 December 2012.

12716/14 GL/kl 1

DGE 2 A EN

3.

The Agreement was signed on 10 June 2013, subject to its conclusion at a later date. The

Decision on the signature and provisional application of the Agreement, together with the text of the Agreement, was published in the Official Journal of the European Union on 2 August

2013 1 .

4.

In order to take into account the accession of Croatia to the European Union on 1 July 2013, the Commission presented the above proposal to the Council on 19 June 2014.

5.

Further to the examination of the proposal by the Aviation Working party, the text of the above draft Council decision on the signature of the Protocol has now been prepared by the

Council Legal Linguist Services. 2

6.

Following the examination of the text, COREPER could invite the Council to adopt the above draft Council decision so as to permit the inclusion of Croatia to the Euro-Mediterranean

Aviation Agreement between the European Union and its Member States and the Government of the State of Israel.

1 OJ L 208, 2.8.2013, p. 1.

2 12262/14 AVIATION 155 ISR 4, 12264/14 AVIATION 156 ISR 5.

12716/14 GL/kl 2

DGE 2 A EN

Revised versions, corrections and addenda

30 Sep
